1.0.2.name: wordpress/custom-user-registration-lite
1.0.2.description: Allows your visitors to register from a page of your website without being redirected to the admin page. Provides a login widget to place on your sidebar and allow to edit profile information. Upgrade to Custom User Registration FULL to enable complete user info details and change password (the lite version allows you to reset the password to a random string but not to change it).
